::Shadow Wing::

She flew on until she needed to rest.  She perched a while in a old 
pine tree.  She waited a bit then took off again heading for the 
lake.  She just hoped that she would make it in time to help the bot 
who called out for help.  

She finally made it to the lake that the bot had specified.
She looked around but didn't see anyone.  She flew around the lake 
and finally saw a bot laying on the sandy shore of the lake.  She 
flew down and transformed into bot mode.  She causiously approaced 
the strange bot.  She looked and noticed that the bot was in stasis 
lock.  He was too big for her to carry, so she sat and waited.  When 
the bot's internal repairs had done thier work, the bot would 
awaken.  She drew her gun and kept it ready, just in case. The bot 
was laying just right, so she couldn't see it's symbol.  But since 
the bot called out on the Maximal frequency, it was most likely a 
maximal, she reasoned.  And put her gun away.  She sat and waited for 
the bot to wake up.
